description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Fruit with Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Grilled Fruit with Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fill baskets with scoops of ice-cream and place onto 8 serving plates. Divide fruit among plates and drizzle over the pan juices. Serve.
